summary:
Have + 6 years of professional experience in audit & assurance. For this period was ascending on the career ladder from Intern to Experienced Supervisor. Assisted in projects of different business areas such as Telecom, Insurance, Oil & Gas etc.
Became qualified ACCA Member and currently successfully passed B2 niveau - Le diplôme d'études en langue française - DELF examen.
